thread.title: Investors to Scrutinize India’s Information Technology Company Earnings
thread.title_full: Investors to Scrutinize India’s Information Technology Company Earnings - WSJ

author: Newley Purnell
title: Investors to Scrutinize India’s Information Technology Company Earnings
text:
Investors will be scrutinizing the results of India’s big information-technology outsourcing companies in the next week for signs of their ability to thrive as cloud computing and other forces reshape the industry.
Analysts expect Infosys Ltd. and Tata Consultancy Services Ltd., India’s two largest outsourcers by sales, to show healthy growth...
